message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to part with it for $18,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand it's a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $16,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $15,500. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $13,500 for the product.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. I can offer it to you for $14,750. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but $14,750 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product.

I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure it's worth my while. I can offer it to you for $13,500. This is my last offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for the product.
